entities.name: neville
entities.description: Neville is described as confused and having contracted brows. He is also mentioned as asking Harry questions.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is described as rubbing his scar to soothe the pain and trying to explain something important to do with fighting You-Know-Who.

entities.name: dumbledore's army
entities.description: Dumbledore's Army is mentioned as a group of people who are nodding in agreement with Harry's plan.

relationships.description: Harry is questioned by Neville about what they need to do.
Dumbledore's Army shows support for Harry's plan and are willing to help him.
